name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Prior to the placement of RIPRAP the foundation must be inspected by the Engineer prior to further work being carried out in the area.
Frequency - 48 Hours Notice Prior to Each Occurrence
Comments / Closeout Details - Is this Required

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rip rap shall be machine placed such that segregation of breakage of stone does not occur. Dumping and spreading of rock shall not be permitted. Stone shall be released as close to is final position as practical to minimise dragging and rehandling.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rip Rap shall have no significant voids occur in the rock blanket through which underlying material could be washed out.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rip Rap shall create an interlocking mass of rock in which no individual rock is free to move by itself; and
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rip Rap shall create a shielding effect on the surface of the rock, which avoids high drag forces that occur when individual rocks protrude into the flow.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The particle size distribution after handling and placement shall conform to the limits set in 030.13.5.
